message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair. Let's get this done!
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is a good middle ground.
I'm willing to go up to 65-35 in my favor. Let's make a deal!
Come on, 56-44 is a fair compromise. Don't be greedy!
I'm sticking to my guns. 70-30 is my final offer.  If you want to get anything at all, you need to accept.
I'm not intimidated, 55-45 is still a fair deal.
This is getting ridiculous. Take it or leave it - 80-20.  The next round, you get nothing.
